items.sentence: Tom should\'ve explained that to Mary in French.
The cabin we stayed in didn\'t have electricity.
The car parked in front of your house is Tom\'s.
The coach was impressed with Tom\'s performance.
If Tom doesn\'t want to go, he doesn\'t have to.
We must finish everything before Monday morning.
Would you please tell me how to spell that word?
Would you please tell me the way to the station?
Tom ordered a pepperoni pizza with extra cheese.
Tom ought to ask Mary for permission to do that.
Tom owes the government a lot of money in taxes.
Tom paid close attention to what was being said.
Why don\'t you apply for the job of interpreter?
Tom might have left his car key in Mary\'s room.
Tom picked up Mary\'s jewelry box and opened it.
I\'ll see you bright and early tomorrow morning.
Tom asked Mary to sing, but she didn\'t want to.
Tom asked Mary to stay, but she didn\'t want to.
I remembered your birthday this year, didn\'t I?
Tom fell asleep and missed the end of the movie.
